item.title: Report X-2025031346
item.description:
Report X-2025031346

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-15T00:53:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-21
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER REPORTED TO DOOR 445. WEARING PROPER PPE USED THE DECISSION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUID. BOX WAS ON THE FLOOR IN THE TRAILER. BOX WAS WET ON BOTTOM CORNER. NO LIQUID ON THE FLOOR NO NEED FOR ZEP ZORBENT. PLACED THE BOX IN A GREEN PLASTIC DMP BAG AND REMOVED IT TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
